item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

I have a Airscape Source, I downloaded it from moparscape, and it came with a client, however, I suck at trying to get clients to work so that why here… So if i wanted other players to connect to my server with this client all i would have to do is change this?

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "New Server IP: ", “New Server IP”, 1);
if(Gui.server != null && Gui.server != “”){
anInt833 = 2; 
    }}</blockquote> Change that to my server IP then could people be able to connect?

Edit: This in Client.Java
